document.full_text: novak djokovic extended his season-opening winning streak to 29 matches on thursday at the madrid open, equaling the best start in men's tennis since ivan lendl in 1986.
document.title: djokovic matches lendl's 29-match winning start
lines_and_colors: novak djokovic extended his season-opening winning streak to 29 matches on thursday at the madrid open, equaling the best start in men's tennis since ivan lendl in 1986.
